Script.EP1: 何だろ？ 私にとって 嫌味が一つもなくてというか
Meaning.EP1: I don't know. There wasn't a single sarcasm in what he said to me.

Script.EP1: でも しっかり 聞いてほしいことを 聞き出してくれたりとか 聞いてくれる
Meaning.EP1: But he listens to what I want to hear, and he listens to me.

Script.EP1: 何か この人になら ついていけるのかなとかって…
Meaning.EP1: I felt like... I could follow him.

Script.EP1: 思えたのかなって
Meaning.EP1: I thought I could follow him.

Script.EP1: さあ エア日本 ええ ただいまですね
Meaning.EP1: Air Japan, yes, I'm home.

Script.EP1: 幸せの滑走路を加速中で
Meaning.EP1: We're accelerating on the runway of happiness.

Script.EP1: 今 離陸いたしました ありがとうございます！
Meaning.EP1: We're taking off now. Thank you!

Script.EP1: えっ ちょっと待って ちょっと待って こんな感じなん？
Meaning.EP1: Wait, wait, wait! Is it like this?

Script.EP1: ありがとう！
Meaning.EP1: Thank you!

Script.EP1: やりました
Meaning.EP1: I did it!

Script.EP1: はあ… 幸せ
Meaning.EP1: I'm so happy!

Script.EP1: ただ もう これが１つ 問題があるんですよ 対面に
Meaning.EP1: But there's one more problem...

Script.EP1: わあっと出て行って…
Meaning.EP1: I'm going out with a bang...

Script.EP1: いやいやいや 無理 無理 無理 ぐわあってくるし
Meaning.EP1: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, I can't. I can't. I can't.

Script.EP1: 無理みたいな
Meaning.EP1: It's like, I can't do it.

Script.EP1: めちゃくちゃ そこが不安ですね 一番
Meaning.EP1: That's what worries me the most.

Script.EP1: 今 いるのが当たり前になってる
Meaning.EP1: I'm taking it for granted that I'm here now.

Script.EP1: これすごい 逃げられてると思って
Meaning.EP1: I feel like I'm running away from this.

Script.EP1: 家族を作るっていう イメージが まだ私の中では湧いてない
Meaning.EP1: I still don't have the image of starting a family.

Script.EP1: どこで間違えてんだろうな
Meaning.EP1: I don't know where I'm going wrong.

Script.EP1: そもそもこの企画に 乗り気じゃないし
Meaning.EP1: I'm not sure I'm ready for this project.

Script.EP1: でも 俺の気持ちは ちゃんとあるから ちゃんと手を伸ばして 待ってるよっていう
Meaning.EP1: But my feelings are there, and I'm waiting for you to reach out to them.

Script.EP1: 分かんないんだよね これだったら１人でいたほうが いいじゃんってなる
Meaning.EP1: I don't get it. If this is the case, it's better to be alone.

Script.EP1: 嫌いです こういうのは好きじゃないし
Meaning.EP1: I don't like it. I don't like this kind of thing.

Script.EP1: プロポーズと現在
Meaning.EP1: The proposal and now...

Script.EP1: 私は どんどん どんどん かけ離れていってる
Meaning.EP1: I'm getting further and further apart.

Script.EP1: お互いぶつかるじゃない ぶつかってなくない？
Meaning.EP1: We're on a collision course. We're not on a collision course.

Script.EP1: 昨日までは 続けたくないって思ってた
Meaning.EP1: Until yesterday, I didn't want to continue.

Script.EP1: 男の人として すごい好きみたいなのが 降りてないっていうだけ
Meaning.EP1: I just haven't gotten over how much I like you as a man.

Script.EP1: 俺は だから ずっとブレてないから 俺は ずっと好きだからさ
Meaning.EP1: I'm not going down. I'm in love with you.

Script.EP1: 俺が知りたいのは 条件ではなくて 気持ちなんだよ
Meaning.EP1: I don't want to know about conditions, I want to know about feelings.

Script.EP1: 信じたい
Meaning.EP1: I want to believe.

Script.EP1: 10年後も20年後も 同じように横で笑ってくれたら
Meaning.EP1: If you're still smiling at me 10 or 20 years from now.
